def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    maxSoFar = arr[1]
    maxEndingHere = arr[0]
    for i in range(1, len(arr)):
        maxEndingHere = max(arr[i], maxEndingHere + arr[i])
        maxSoFar = max(maxSoFar, maxEndingHere)
    return maxSoFar

def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    maxSoFar = arr[-1]
    maxEndingHere = arr[0]
    for i in range(1, len(arr)):
        maxEndingHere = max(arr[i], maxEndingHere + arr[i])
        maxSoFar = max(maxSoFar, maxEndingHere)
    return maxSoFar

def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    maxSoFar = arr[0]
    maxEndingHere = arr[0]
    for i in range(1, len(arr)):
        maxEndingHere = max(arr[i], maxEndingHere - arr[i])
        maxSoFar = max(maxSoFar, maxEndingHere)
    return maxSoFar

def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    maxSoFar = arr[0]
    maxEndingHere = arr[0]
    for i in range(1, len(arr)):
        maxEndingHere = max(arr[i], maxEndingHere * arr[i])
        maxSoFar = max(maxSoFar, maxEndingHere)
    return maxSoFar
